ISSUE.TITLE: Add event for system warnings
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: To allow plugin developers to add custom SystemWarning from plugins, let's add an appropriate event Add the following code to the "PrepareSystemWarningModelsAsync" method: `await _eventPublisher.PublishAsync(new SystemWarningCreatedEvent(model));` And a new SystemWarningCreatedEvent class ``` /// <summary> /// Represents an event that occurs when the sitemap is created /// </summary> public class SystemWarningCreatedEvent { #region Ctor public SystemWarningCreatedEvent (IList<SystemWarningModel> systemWarnings ) { SystemWarnings = systemWarnings ?? new List<SystemWarningModel>(); } #endregion #region Properties /// <summary> /// Gets a list of sitemap URLs /// </summary> public IList<SystemWarningModel> SystemWarnings { get; } #endregion } ```
